description: JSON schema for project 8 candidates from analysis

eggfile.description: the data file this candidate list is derived from

record_size.description: the number of samples in a record

timing.description: the time interval in samples that the event occured in, [start,end,start_uncertainty,end_uncertainty]

support.description: the time interval in samples that the event occured in, [start_record, start_sample, end_record, end_sample]

frequency.description: the frequency range in Hz that the even occurred in, [start,end,start_uncertainy,end_uncertainty]

power.description: the power in Watts radiated by the electron, [power, uncertainty]

energy.descirption: reconstructed energy of the electron, in eV [energy,uncertainty]

confidence.description: probability this is a real event and not noise with 1 being absolute confidence that this is a real event
